about_page_content-1: The Zero Waste Foundation was established in 2023 under the patronage of Emine Erdoğan, the wife of President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
about_page_content-2: The foundation operates to promote and ensure the sustainability of the Zero Waste Project. It works to encourage every individual and institution to adopt a zero waste mindset, aiming to create an environmentally conscious society.
about_page_content-3: Among the foundation's core objectives are increasing awareness of zero waste, encouraging the sharing of knowledge and experience, and developing and disseminating practices in this field.
about_page_content-4: In pursuit of these goals, comprehensive efforts are underway in education, research, project development, and implementation. Collaborative initiatives with public institutions, the private sector, and non-governmental organizations are continuously carried out to implement zero waste practices across all areas, while zero waste projects are promoted internationally to create a global impact.

ai_assistant_section.text: Ask your questions or interact with the AI for instant help!

valuesGridDes.id1Des: We approach the environment and natural resources with empathy and sensitivity.
valuesGridDes.id2Des: We uphold the highest standards of honesty and transparency.
valuesGridDes.id3Des: We work in collaboration with non-governmental organizations and individuals.
valuesGridDes.id4Des: We develop sustainable solutions to build a long-term future.

heroSection.title: Empowering Communities, Transforming Lives.!
heroSection.subtitle: Make a difference by joining Zero Waste. Our organization is dedicated to improving lives through various community projects and initiatives.
